titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay, Political Department to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a letter to Abbas Meerza [Abbas Mirza] from Sir Evan Nepean, Governor of Bombay, with the request that Bruce forward it on. There is also a translation of the letter, which confirms that Mr Armstrong has been allowed to return to Persia to be employed by Abbas Meerza.
